title: Make ADC Ahri viable again.
body:
Hi guys, long-time beta player here.

Ever since the changes to the game, I can't play Ahri ADC anymore. 

1. Philosophers stone being removed.
    This makes me have to roam to mid lane to take the farm.

2. W no longer has an AD ratio.
    
3. Charm now has 200 less range.
    Now to get a pick, I literally have to be in the enemies face.

Seriously riot, I am considering unsubbing as you ruined my main.

replies.body:
It's still viable, you just have to change the way you play it. [(x](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/adc-ahri-what-does-the-fox-say-443461) [x)](http://www.mobafire.com/league-of-legends/build/6-4-update-gt-why-ahri-adc-gt-you-will-see-451600))

> Philosophers stone being removed.
This makes me have to roam to mid lane to take the farm.

If you are adc you have your own lane to farm?? I'm sorry, I don't really understand this

>W no longer has an AD ratio.

Most mages don't have AD scalings and  hybrid itemisation is pretty lame (especially since changes to triforce). [Here is an in-depth discussion about the balancing issues around hybrid damage.](http://www.surrenderat20.net/2013/05/xypherous-talks-hybrid-itemization-and.html)

>Charm now has 200 less range.
Now to get a pick, I literally have to be in the enemies face.

You don't have to be that close,  it's still pretty easy to land and get a combo off safely. Ahri is a really mobile champion, with her ult and the move speed buff from her Q making it really easy to position well and play safely while dishing out tonnes of damage.
